thread.title: C.R. England Names New Dedicated Division President
thread.title_full: C.R. England Names New Dedicated Division President - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: C.R. England Names New Dedicated Division President
text:
C.R. England, Inc.
SALT LAKE CITY , Sept. 30, C.R. England Chief Operating Officer Zach England has announced the hiring of Kirk Freimuth as President of the company's Dedicated Division. Mr. Freimuth returns to C.R. England where he had previously worked since 2005.
"I am pleased to welcome Kirk back to C.R. England in this very important role," England said. "Kirk brings to this position a knowledge and understanding that makes him uniquely qualified to lead our Dedicated Division. The division and the company will benefit from his leadership and innovation and it is great to have him back at C.R. England."
Mr. Freimuth rejoins C.R. England after serving for three years as Senior Vice President at NFI in Cherry Hill, New Jersey. Prior to his three-year tenure with NFI, Mr. Freimuth had been employed with C.R. England, working his way up through the Dedicated Division. He has held such roles as Operations Manager, Director, Senior Director and Vice President in Dedicated.
Mr. Freimuth has worked in transportation since 1987, holding various positions throughout the industry. He has worked with numerous Fortune 100 companies, providing transportation solutions over multiple modes. He brings to this new role strong credentials in end-to-end supply chain management with a heavy focus on North American operations.
About C.R. England
Founded in 1920, C.R. England, Inc. corporate headquarters are located in Salt Lake City, Utah and is one of North America's largest transportation companies. C.R. England services include National, Mexico and Regional Truckload service in addition to Dedicated and Intermodal services. Visit www.crengland.com .
